summary: An email from an NYPD detective expressing gratitude to FBI Police Officers for their professional assistance during the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein at 26 Federal Plaza on July 6, 2019. The detective is part of the NYPD Detective Bureau Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the arrest process at 26 Federal Plaza on July 6, 2019.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Arrest at 26 Federal Plaza
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested at 26 Federal Plaza with assistance from FBI Police Officers.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on Saturday, July 6, 2019.
The arrest took place at 26 Federal Plaza.
FBI Police Officers provided professional assistance during the arrest process.
The correspondence is from an NYPD detective with the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force.
The email expressing gratitude was sent on July 8, 2019.
